pageContext.claim: “The dishonest media did not explain that I called the fake news the enemy of the people. The fake news. They dropped off the word ‘fake.’ And all of a sudden the story became the media is the enemy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump listed five mainstream media organizations –The New York Times, NBC, ABC, CBS and CNN – as the “fake news media” and declared they are the enemy of the American people. By listing major media organizations as the enemy, Trump was clearly making a statement about the broader news media.
